casebody.data:
William W. Thompson, Respondent v. The Manhattan Railway Company, et al., Impleaded, etc., Appellants. Decided May 4, 1891. Appeal from judgment en*587tered on the report of referees. Davies & Rapallo, for appellants. John A. Weeks, Jr., for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and McAdam, JJ.

Per Curiam.

It is conceded by the counsel for appellants that the matters on which a reversal is asked have been determined by this court adversely to the defendants. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
